  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method of the CRSConsole
      Parameters:
      args - arguments

    • menu1

      public static boolean menu1()
      display the main page menu for the user and call respective methods depending on user's choice
      Returns:
      true if quit, false if not quit

    • menu

      public static boolean menu​(Assignment1.CRSConsole.UserType uType)
      display the specific menu page for different type of user, then invoke the respective handle user method to handle user's choice
      Parameters:
      uType - UserType Enum instance
      Returns:
      true if the user wishes to continue, false if user quits this menu

    • handleStaffMenu

      public static boolean handleStaffMenu​(char choice)
      This method will handle the methods for Staff
      Parameters:
      choice - char represent user choice
      Returns:
      a boolean object represent quit or not

    • organizeTrip

      public static void organizeTrip()
      A Staff method to organize trips. Will ask input from user for the trip information.

    • viewApplication

      public static void viewApplication()
      Staff method. Display all the trips and applications of the trips which are organized by the Staff

    • manageApplication

      public static void manageApplication()
      Staff method. Display the trips and applications of the trips by the staff and manage those application.

    • handleVolunteerMenu

      public static boolean handleVolunteerMenu​(char choice)
      This method will handle the Volunteer methods and invoke the corresponding methods
      Parameters:
      choice - char represents the user choice
      Returns:
      true if display the menu again, false if user quit

    • manageVolunteerProfile

      public static void manageVolunteerProfile()
      Volunteer method. Volunteer can change password, phone number, name, or upload a document.

    • applyForTrip

      public static void applyForTrip()
      Volunteer method. The volunteer selects to view all trips, and can select one to join. If there is still space available, an application is created for the Volunteer to join the Trip. The applicationID is generated and the application date is set to the system date. The status is set to “NEW”.

    • viewApplicationStatus

      public static void viewApplicationStatus()
      Volunteer method.Volunteer wants to check the status of his or her applications. The volunteer select to view the trips that they have applied for. The trip date, description and application status and remarks will be shown.

    • login

      public static java.lang.String[] login()
      Method to handle login for all users. Ask for username and password, then return the username and password in String array
      Returns:
      uInfo

    • veifyLogin

      public static int veifyLogin​(java.lang.String[] uInfo)
      method to verify is the login is valid.
      Parameters:
      uInfo - A String array contains username and password
      Returns:
      errorCode 0 - valid 1 - no username 2 - wrong password -99- admin login

    • handleLogin

      public static boolean handleLogin()
      method to handle user login. If success login the current user will be set as the success login user.
      Returns:
      true is success login,false if invalid login, wrong username or password

    • askForUsername

      public static java.lang.String askForUsername​(java.lang.String message)
      A method to print and ask username from user, if empty username is given, then the user will be asked to prompt the username again. The username entered will be converted into uppercase.
      Parameters:
      message - String
      Returns:
      username

    • askForPhoneNum

      public static java.lang.String askForPhoneNum​(java.lang.String message)
      Ask for phone number and validate the input. If invalid, ask again. Valid phone number is all numbers
      Parameters:
      message - String.
      Returns:
      the phone number input

    • askForNonNullStringInput

      public static java.lang.String askForNonNullStringInput​(java.lang.String inputMessage, java.lang.String nullErrorMessage)
      A method to ask for user to prompt a not null input, if empty ask again.
      Parameters:
      inputMessage - String. Message that will be displayed when asking for input.
      nullErrorMessage - String message that will be displayed if null value is given
      Returns:
      input

    • askFprStaffDate

      public static java.lang.String askFprStaffDate()
      Method that ask user for a date input, then check whether is the input date valid. If invalid, ask the user to input again until valid date is given.
      Returns:
      staffDate

    • signUpAsVolunteer

      public static void signUpAsVolunteer()
      This method allows guest to sign up for Volunteer. The volunteer has to enter valid username, password, name and phone number.

    • recordCRSStaff

      public static void recordCRSStaff()
      A method for CRS Manager to record a new staff member. The CRS Manager enters the staff’s username, password, name, phone, position and date joined.

    • isValidPhone

      public static boolean isValidPhone​(java.lang.String phone)
      Method to check phone number, return true if valid, false if invalid
      Parameters:
      phone - String check wether is the phone a valid string to be convert into int
      Returns:
      the isValid

    • isValidDate

      public static boolean isValidDate​(java.lang.String dateStr)
      Method to check date, return true if valid, false if invalid
      Parameters:
      dateStr - String check wether is the dateStr a valid string to be convert into LocalDate
      Returns:
      the isValid

    • stringToLocalDate

      public static java.time.LocalDate stringToLocalDate​(java.lang.String date)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the LocalDate

    • quit

      public static void quit()
      method to handle quit action by the user

    • addKAndListVintoHashtable

      public static void addKAndListVintoHashtable​(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> ht, java.lang.String k, java.lang.String v)
      add key and value into a hashtable. If the key already exists, the add value into the List. If new key and value, create a new list and add the value into the list, then put the key and list into the hashtable.
      Parameters:
      ht - the hashtable
      k - key
      v - value
